nodes.text: The Kaal Connection is an article from Star Wars Adventure Journal 7, written by Peter M. Schweighofer and Timothy Zahn, and illustrated by David R. Deitrick. It was updated and reprinted in Classic Adventures: Volume Four - The Best of the Journal. Set in 6 ABY, it centers around attempts to claim the food planet Kaal from crimelord Tirgee Benyalle by the Galactic Empire (represented by Kermen), warlord factions (represented by Utoxx Prentioch), and the New Republic (represented by the players). Talon Karrde also makes an appearance, and it is the first appearance of Jeng Droga.
